Content: This article provided exactly what I needed to understand dependency injection properly. The examples were clear and the explanations of service lifetimes were particularly helpful. I've already started implementing these patterns in my current project.

The section about query optimization was eye-opening. I never realized how much performance impact the difference between IEnumerable and IQueryable could have. Would love to see a follow-up post about handling complex joins efficiently.

The microservices architecture patterns described here helped me understand how to better structure our distributed system. The examples of handling data consistency across services were particularly valuable.

Great coverage of exception handling best practices. The middleware implementation example was especially useful. I've implemented similar patterns in my projects and it has significantly improved our error tracking.

The performance optimization techniques for Entity Framework Core were invaluable. I especially appreciated the detailed explanation of when to use different tracking options and how they affect application performance.
